data.detected_issue: Cardinality estimate was off by 15x - table users had 150,000 rows but estimated 10,000
data.action_taken: Reordered joins: moved users join earlier to filter earlier

data.detected_issue: Nested loop join taking longer than expected - inner table larger than anticipated
data.action_taken: Switched from nested loop to hash join for orders table

data.detected_issue: Sequential scan on products slower than expected due to disk I/O
data.action_taken: Switched to index scan using products_category_idx
